content: {"Name": "Redemption Church Food Pantry", "Entity_Id": 2363, "Category": "Food Pantry", "Subcategory": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "Organization": "Redemption Church of Christ Watervliet", "More_Information": "Hot Meals: Tuesdays 4:00 pm-6:00 pm \r\nWill serve emergency basis when pantry is closed\r\nGuest can visit twice a month Drive through registration, drive through pick up, prepacked", "Counties": ["Albany"], "Location": "Watervliet", "Address": "1511 6th Avenue", "City": "Watervliet", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12189", "Phone": "(518) 272-7848", "Hours_of_Operation": "1st & 3rd Thursdays 11:00am-1:00pm", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "", "Coalition": 1, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.726875", "Longitude": "-73.706484", "Last_Updated": "03-05-2025", "icon": "marker-F42000", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
